name: Thinken!
description:
Do you like puzzle games? Yes?

In THINKEN! your goal is move the pieces to the marked area.
Use the full number of movements of each piece for it.

Can you solve all the levels?

Controls: 
arrow keys to move
enter/z to select(unselect) 
A to restart the stage
esc to pause. 

Automatic save system.

Original BGM. 

No need RTP. 

Engine: Rpg Maker Vx Ace

 Feel free to leave a comment below.
